title: HARMAN’s Aditi Technologies Named “Services Rising Star” at EGR B2B Awards 2015
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Wed, Jul 8, 2015, 12:23 BST - UK Markets close in 4 hrs 7 mins HARMAN’s Aditi Technologies Named “Services Rising Star” at EGR B2B Awards 2015 Press Release : HARMAN – 23 minutes ago +0.89 
LONDON--(BUSINESSWIRE)-- 
HARMAN, the leading global infotainment, audio and software services company, today announced that Aditi Technologies (now part of HARMAN Connected Services Division) was named the Services Rising Star at EGR B2B Awards 2015. 
The award is in recognition of Aditi’s accomplishments over several years in implementing game-changing digital transformation strategies for leading bookmakers such as Ladbrokes and Sky Betting and Gaming, and game suppliers such as Inspired Gaming. 
A major differentiator is the flexible and scalable Aditi service approach towards improving core betting and gaming experience, not only for digital offerings but also for retail specific initiatives such as second screen apps that have increased player engagement across channels and ensured more revenues for clients. 
“It is a great honor to receive this award in recognition for our work in offering solutions that create cost and revenue synergies for our customers,” says Kaushik Banerjee, Senior Vice President, Aditi Technologies/Harman Connected Services division. “Our extensive experience on Social, Mobile, Analytics and Cloud technology has generated huge competitive advantages for our betting & gaming clients. We look forward to being nominated for, and winning, even more awards next year.” 
“It is no surprise to us that Aditi has won this award,” says Mark Grimes, CIO Ladbrokes. “They have been our strategic partner for over five years and been involved in multiple innovation programs. The partnership has helped us to deliver a better digital experience across all channels. Their betting and gaming domain knowledge and analytical approach has helped us to expand our customer base and increase the range of products we offer to our customers.” 
Aditi was also nominated in the IT Supplier and Mobile Supplier categories at the awards. 
About HARMAN 
HARMAN ( harman.com ) designs and engineers connected products and solutions for consumers, automakers, and enterprises worldwide, including audio, visual and infotainment systems; enterprise automation solutions; and software services. With leading brands including AKG®, Harman Kardon®, Infinity®, JBL®, Lexicon® , Mark Levinson ® and Revel®, HARMAN is admired by audiophiles, musicians and the entertainment venues where they perform around the world. HARMAN also is a technology and integration services leader for the Automotive, Mobile, Telecommunications and Enterprise markets. More than 25 million automobiles on the road today are equipped with HARMAN audio and infotainment systems. The Company's software solutions power billions of mobile devices and systems that are connected, integrated, personalized, adaptive and secure across all platforms, from the work and home to car and mobile. HARMAN has a workforce of approximately 25,000 people across the Americas, Europe, and Asia and reported sales of $5.9 billion during the last 12 months ended March 31, 2015. The Company's shares are traded on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol NYSE:HAR. 
About Aditi Technologies 
Aditi Technologies , now part of HARMAN Connected Services, has helped over 150 companies transform and run their business with cloud platforms across IaaS, PaaS and SaaS services. Aditi cloud workloads services span across IaaS migration, SaaS enablement, data orchestration, and mobile workloads for product companies, e-commerce, media and travel verticals. 
About EGR B2B Awards 
The EGR B2B Awards now in its sixth year, rewards and celebrates the very best service providers in the online gaming industry, recognising the achievements of suppliers from across all the major e-gaming disciplines including betting and gaming software, networks, mobile, payments, recruitment, IT and infrastructure.
